item.description:
** I'll buy some chicken and beef for grilling **

 ** We could use other items, such as green salads, pasta salads, bread, appetizers, desserts and bottles of ZIN **

 

  The Red wine group is having a Bring Zin and eat BBQ.

This invitation will be sent to all the wine groups. So if you've already RSVP'd for one group, you don't need to RSVP again.

 

Detasils to follow but the title pretty much says it all. They'll be a small cost per person for all the meats.

And of course, any food donations are welcome. I'll coordinate as the date is closer.

 

Thanks,

Mike

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Bring Zin and eat BBQ
